name: Deadly Creatures PVE 0.3.1
description:
This mod makes wild creatures more dangerous. Shouldn't be possible to perform naked run across all map due to increased speed of creatures and their crippled attacks. 

Creatures:
Hyenas:
	Speed up to 1300
	Added long cripple attacks
Bears:
	Added long cripple attacks
	Speed up to 1300
	Bearpaw attack speed incresed on 1.5
	Bearjab attack speed incresed on 1.5
Cats
	Main attack speed increased on 1.6
	Added crippled attacks
	Speed up to 1400
Wolves
	Speed up to 1350
	Added long cripple attacks
	Slightly amended preferred attacks
Primates
   Speed up to 1000
   Added long cripple attacks
   Main attack speed increased on 1.6
Rocknose
   Speed up to 1100
   Added long cripple attacks
   Main attacks speed increased on 1.6
Crocos
   Speed up to 600
   Added long cripple attacks
   Main attacks speed increased on 1.6

Additional for another mods:
Hardened North:
  Lava Spiders have increased duration of crippled effect
author: Fenyx
